name: pgedge
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing pgedge cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`pgedge` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/pgEdge/terraform-provider-pgedge).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing pgedge cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/pgEdge/terraform-provider-pgedge)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-pgedge` repo](https://github.com/pgEdge/pulumi-pgedge/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-pgedge` repo](https://github.com/pgEdge/terraform-provider-pgedge/issues).

> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/pgEdge/terraform-provider-pgedge)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-pgedge` repo](https://github.com/pgEdge/pulumi-pgedge/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-pgedge` repo](https://github.com/pgEdge/terraform-provider-pgedge/issues).

baseUrl.description: Base Url to use when connecting to the PgEdge service.

id.description: Unique identifier for the backup config.

backupStoreId.description: ID of the backup store to use. If specified, other fields will be automatically populated.

gcsBucket.description: GCS bucket name for gcs-type repositories.

retentionFullType.description: Type of retention for full backups.

s3Bucket.description: S3 bucket name for s3-type repositories.

createdAt.description: Creation time of the cloud account

properties.description: Additional properties of the cloud account

type.description: Type of the cloud account (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)

backupStoreIds.description: Backup store IDs of the cluster

cloudAccountId.description: Cloud account ID of the cluster

nodeLocation.description: Node location of the cluster. Must be either 'public' or 'private'.

sshKeyId.description: SSH key ID of the cluster

instanceType.description: Instance type used for the node

volumeIops.description: Volume IOPS of the node data volume

volumeSize.description: Volume size of the node data volume

volumeType.description: Volume type of the node data volume

clusterId.description: ID of the cluster this database belongs to

nodes.description: Map of nodes in the database

createdAt.description: Creation time of the SSH key

provider.description:
The provider type for the pgedge package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.
